attributes.action: limit the salary of MPs and ministers to match that of the lowest paid grade of nurse and to tie the pay rises of MPs and ministers to that of nurses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the interests of fairness and in order to prevent MPs awarding themselves huge pay rises which they do not deserve, MPs and ministers should receive only the same pay as the lowest grade of public sector workers. STOP THE GRAVY TRAIN!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
